name: add_shortLeg
explain: Human can mutate to have short leg. They will produce 2x happiness but consume more energy.

name: add_tentacleArm
explain: Human can mutate to have tentacles. They will produce 2x happiness but 0.5x food.

name: add_pincerArm
explain: Human can mutate to have pincers. They will produce 2x food but 0.5x happiness.

name: add_breathWithoutHelmet
explain: Human can mutate to breath in space. Their energy consumed slow but eat 2x food.

name: buff_worshipPincerEfficiency
explain: Human worship pincer and work 20% better to make food.

name: buff_meteoFairSlow
explain: Human afraid of meteo and work 20% worse to make me happy.

name: buff_petRecoverFaster
explain: Human loves pets and recover 50% faster in rest room.

name: buff_worshipTentacleEfficiency
explain: Human worship tentacle and work 20% better to make me happy.

name: buff_tradeFear
explain: Human afraid of being sold and eat 50% extra food.

name: buff_newHumanLessEfficiency
explain: There are some newcomers exuding a sense of sabotage. Work 20% worse to make me happy.
